overview: New York City tenement dwelling neighbors Blondie and Lottie are longtime best friends. When Lottie makes the cast of the Follies and moves up in the world, she arranges for Blondie, as well, to join the cast and gain the advantages. But the friendship goes awry when Lottie's sweetheart, wealthy Larry Belmont, falls for Blondie and she for him.
tagline: "RICH MEN think they can take whatever they choose!" "-We're poor people. Leave our girls alone with your motor cars and penthouse apartments!"
title: Blondie of the Follies
